title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB:
When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content:
1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag.
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag.
3) Text with RTF tags.
The dynamic text content type does not have any effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Prepare a database field with the three types of content as described.
2. Configure a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type applied to the field does not have any effect on how the content is displayed.
